translation.en: [Marco] Do y'all wake up desperate to smash that snooze button?
translation.ja: 目覚ましのアラームが憎い？

translation.en: Is the struggle to be a grown-up realer than real?
translation.ja: まともな大人になれず もがいてる？

translation.en: Do you have no idea what you're gonna do with your life?
translation.ja: 人生に行き詰まり 先が見えない？

translation.en: I can't really help you with that 'cause I'm still figuring it all out too.
translation.ja: 僕も悩んでるから 解決策は教えられない

translation.en: But, hey, even if we don't have all the answers, we can still get gorgeous together.
translation.ja: 答えは出なくても 一緒にゴージャスになろう

translation.en: Hey, guys. It's me, Marco. And welcome back to the channel.
translation.ja: マルコだよ 僕のチャンネルにようこそ

translation.en: If you don't know me, then buckle up, bitch, because you're about to.
translation.ja: 自己紹介するから よく聞いて

translation.en: I am a makeup artist and beauty industry professional, working with all the major brands,
translation.ja: 有名ブランドと仕事をする メイクのプロで⸺

translation.en: including the one, the only, the original Glamorous by Madolyn.
translation.ja: あのグラマラス･バイ･ マドリンも扱ってる あのグラマラス･バイ･ マドリンも扱ってる “ヴォーグ” あのグラマラス･バイ･ マドリンも扱ってる あのグラマラス･バイ･ マドリンも扱ってる “ヴァニティー･ フェア”

translation.en: Click the link below for 10% off and enter MARCO at checkout.
translation.ja: 下のリンクから 買えるよ “紹介コード入力で 10％オフ”

translation.en: I'm kind of an influencer. Maybe you've seen my content.
translation.ja: それから インフルエンサーとして

translation.en: It's a little random...
translation.ja: いろいろ発信してる いろいろ発信してる “60秒でメイク”

translation.en: Ooh, a little there.
translation.ja: こんなの見たことないよね？ “人形の手でメイク”

translation.en: You ain't never seen this before. Oh!
translation.ja: こんなの見たことないよね？ “人形の手でメイク” こんなの見たことないよね？

translation.en: Or maybe you've seen my mom make an appearance.
translation.ja: 僕のママを見たことある？

translation.en: She loves helping out with my content.
translation.ja: 喜んで撮影に協力してくれる

translation.en: Tell us about your beauty routine.
translation.ja: 美容のための日課は？ “ママのメイクに 突撃取材”

translation.en: What beauty routine?
translation.ja: “ママのメイクに 突撃取材” やめてよ

translation.en: Come on. My viewers wanna know.
translation.ja: “ママのメイクに 突撃取材” 視聴者が待ってる

translation.en: -What viewers? -[scoffs]
translation.ja: 関係ない

translation.en: Rude.
translation.ja: 失礼だね

translation.en: Makeup is my life.
translation.ja: メイクは僕の人生

translation.en: And not just because it's the only thing I'm good at.
translation.ja: 唯一の得意分野だ

translation.en: But because it gives me confidence
translation.ja: メイクをすると自信が湧き

translation.en: and it makes you feel like you're somebody.
translation.ja: 立派な人間になれた気がする

translation.en: And when you have your beat done right, you know you matter.
translation.ja: 自分は価値ある存在だと 感じるんだ

translation.en: So if you wanna know more, like this video,
translation.ja: もっと僕の動画を観たいなら チャンネル登録をして

translation.en: smash that subscribe button, and turn on notifications.
translation.ja: もっと僕の動画を観たいなら チャンネル登録をして 通知をオンに

translation.en: Get into this gig, honey, because we are going places.
translation.ja: 一緒に成功への階段を上ろう

translation.en: We are going to snatch that crown together.
translation.ja: 夢を⸺ かなえるんだ

translation.en: And before you go, remember one thing.
translation.ja: 最後に これは忘れないで

translation.en: You're beautiful. Say it back.
translation.ja: あなたは きれいだよ 僕にも言って

translation.en: Okay. I'll be even later than normal to work.
translation.ja: “法律事務所” “法律事務所” 仕事に遅れちゃう なぜ僕を連れてきたの？ 仕事に遅れちゃう なぜ僕を連れてきたの？

translation.en: Why am I here?
translation.ja: 仕事に遅れちゃう なぜ僕を連れてきたの？

translation.en: Because I got you a job.
translation.ja: あなたに 仕事を用意したからよ

translation.en: There is an opening in the paralegal training program and I called in a favor with the partners.
translation.ja: パラリーガルの 研修プログラムに登録した

translation.en: It's all yours.
translation.ja: あなたの席よ

translation.en: We'll get that fixed. Then it's all yours.
translation.ja: 後で直しとく　頑張って

translation.en: I already have a job.
translation.ja: 僕は無職じゃない

translation.en: I'm a beauty professional, with a name tag and everything.
translation.ja: 美容のプロで 名札も制服もある

translation.en: Marco, you are 22 years old, and you sell makeup at the mall, part-time.
translation.ja: 22歳にもなって 化粧品売り場のバイト？

translation.en: I'm sorry. Time's up.
translation.ja: もう時間切れよ

translation.en: You gotta join the real world. That starts with paying me rent.
translation.ja: 社会に出て まずは私に家賃を払って

translation.en: -Rent? -Mm-hm. To my mother?
translation.ja: 母親に家賃を払えと？

translation.en: Okay, that can't be legal.
translation.ja: そんなの違法だ

translation.en: I need a lawyer.
translation.ja: 誰か弁護して

translation.en: I know it's scary, but you gotta start taking your life seriously.
translation.ja: 不安でしょうけど まじめに考えて

translation.en: You can't do that until you pay your way.
translation.ja: 今のままじゃ先が見えない

translation.en: And who knows. You might even like it.
translation.ja: この仕事を気に入るかも

translation.en: I just thought my life would be more than this.
translation.ja: もっと華やかな人生を 期待してた

translation.en: Yes, we all want more,
translation.ja: 誰でも そうよ

translation.en: and sometimes we just have to be happy with enough.
translation.ja: でも身の丈を知らないとね

translation.en: [Marco] That's it for now, gorgeenas, but remember this.
translation.ja: 配信は終わりだよ でも忘れないで

translation.en: You are a star. You are worth it.
translation.ja: あなたは スターになるべき存在

translation.en: And if anyone tries to tell you anything different, don't listen to them, listen to you.
translation.ja: 違うと言われても無視して 自分を貫いて

translation.en: Even if they make a lot of sense
translation.ja: 彼らの言うことが

translation.en: and you're starting to get worried they might be right.
translation.ja: 正しいように思えてもね

translation.en: Oh. And don't forget, you're beautiful.
translation.ja: あなたは きれいだよ

translation.en: Say it back.
translation.ja: 僕にも言って

translation.en: Hey, Marco. How's the channel going?
translation.ja: チャンネルは順調？

translation.en: Oh, wait, I don't care.
translation.ja: 答えなくていい

translation.en: All I wanna know is how much product you can push at Carmen Sandiego over there.
translation.ja: あのコスプレ客に 化粧品を売って

translation.en: Hey, Marco? You've got a job to do.
translation.ja: マルコ　仕事してね

translation.en: Go do it.
translation.ja: 行って

translation.en: Hi. Is there anything I can help you with today?
translation.ja: お手伝いしましょうか？

translation.en: I was hoping you could tell me.
translation.ja: お願いするわ

translation.en: Has anyone ever told you that you kind of look like...?
translation.ja: あの人に似てると 言われません？

translation.en: [woman] Yeah. All the time.
translation.ja: ええ　いつも言われる

translation.en: It's you. You're Madolyn Addison.
translation.ja: あなたは マドリン･アディソン

translation.en: Literally Madolyn Addison.
translation.ja: 本人ですよね？

translation.en: -What do I do? Bow? I'll bow. -Please, don't.
translation.ja: お辞儀すべき？ やめて

translation.en: What are you doing buying your own makeup in the mall? You should own the mall.
translation.ja: なぜ自社の売り場に 来たんですか？

translation.en: I like to understand my customers. How they shop, what they like.
translation.ja: 顧客の好みを理解したいの

translation.en: You're looking at one of your customers right now.
translation.ja: 僕も愛用者の１人ですよ

translation.en: My beat is full Glamorous by Madolyn as we speak.
translation.ja: コスメは全部グラマラスです

translation.en: You think you can give me a makeover?
translation.ja: 私にメイクしてくれる？

translation.en: You want me to paint you?
translation.ja: 僕が あなたを？

translation.en: The best way to sell product is to use product.
translation.ja: 商品を売るには 使ってみせなきゃ

translation.en: [Marco] So tell me something, the Madolyn Addison,
translation.ja: マドリン　教えてください

translation.en: why does the supermodel of the world start a makeup empire?
translation.ja: スーパーモデルが なぜ化粧品会社の社長に？

translation.en: Because nobody thought I could.
translation.ja: 不可能と言われたの

translation.en: Oh, aren't you going in a little heavy with that contour?
translation.ja: そのシェーディングは 濃すぎない？

translation.en: With all due respect, this is Glamorous by Madolyn.
translation.ja: グラマラスは色が薄いから

translation.en: You can't go in too hard with 20 shades of beige.
translation.ja: これでも濃くなりません

translation.en: Are you calling my makeup bland?
translation.ja: うちの商品は物足りない？

translation.en: No, but can I be honest?
translation.ja: いいえ でも正直⸺

translation.en: It doesn't sell like it used to.
translation.ja: 人気は落ちてます

translation.en: Our customers feel like it's safe. It--
translation.ja: 無難すぎると思われてる

translation.en: -It never changes. -We sell a classic look.
translation.ja: 無難すぎると思われてる 我が社の売りは上品さよ

translation.en: Well, I know, but...
translation.ja: 分かりますが⸺

translation.en: maybe your customers want more. I know I do.
translation.ja: 僕を含め 顧客は満足してない

translation.en: I need freedom.
translation.ja: 自由が欲しい

translation.en: I need to feel the fantasy.
translation.ja: 夢を見たいんです

translation.en: I need to feel like anything is possible.
translation.ja: 無限の可能性を感じたい

translation.en: Because when I do my makeup in the morning,
translation.ja: メイクをしている間は

translation.en: I'm not some boy who lives with his mom and can't get a real job.
translation.ja: 実家暮らしで アルバイトなのを忘れられる

translation.en: I get to be a star, a diva.
translation.ja: スターや歌姫になれるんです

translation.en: I get to be anything that I want to be.
translation.ja: なりたい自分になれる

translation.en: And that's what this is. I mean...
translation.ja: メイクの力です

translation.en: This is more than just paint or glitter.
translation.ja: 色を塗り ラメを乗せるだけじゃない

translation.en: It's therapy in a tube. Magic in a jar.
translation.ja: メイクは癒やしであり 魔法なんです

translation.en: Because this doesn't just touch your face. It touches you.
translation.ja: 顔だけじゃなく 心を彩ることができる

translation.en: It's beautiful.
translation.ja: きれいね

translation.en: I hate to ask this, but how would you feel about helping me hit my sales goal this month?
translation.ja: 不躾(ぶしつけ)ですが ノルマに 協力していただけません？

translation.en: -Wrap them all up. -Mm!
translation.ja: 全部 買うわ

translation.en: Do you like working here, Marco?
translation.ja: この仕事は好き？

translation.en: Um, yeah, but I have to quit soon.
translation.ja: はい　でも辞めるんです

translation.en: My mom needs me to get a real job.
translation.ja: 母が まともな仕事に就けと

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: そうなの？

translation.en: I think you might have something important to say about makeup.
translation.ja: あなたの意見は 貴重かもしれない

translation.en: And I know someone who might be hiring.
translation.ja: 雇ってあげてもいいわ

translation.en: This woman already has an assistant, but she's still gonna hire you?
translation.ja: もうアシスタントは いるんでしょ？

translation.en: Yes. As her second assistant.
translation.ja: 僕は２番手だけど

translation.en: Like Andy in The Devil Wears Prada,
translation.ja: 「プラダを着た悪魔」の 主人公とは違う

translation.en: except I don't even need a makeover, I'm already snatched.
translation.ja: 「プラダを着た悪魔」の 主人公とは違う 爆イケだ

translation.en: I know how much it means to you to be in beauty or fashion or whatever,
translation.ja: 美容の仕事が好きなのは 分かるけど

translation.en: but you can't turn down the paralegal program for some minimum-wage job.
translation.ja: パラリーガルのほうが 稼げるわ

translation.en: It pays 20 an hour. With overtime.
translation.ja: 時給20ドルで 残業代が出て⸺

translation.en: And benefits.
translation.ja: 福利厚生もつく

translation.en: It sounds too good to be true.
translation.ja: 話がうますぎる

translation.en: You take this job, you'll wake up in a tub of ice with a kidney missing.
translation.ja: 臓器売買の餌食になるかも

translation.en: I can't allow it.
translation.ja: 許可できない

translation.en: Why not? It pays the rent.
translation.ja: 家賃が払えるよ

translation.en: Because it's the easy way out. And you never want to do the work.
translation.ja: だから楽な道を？ いつも労働を避けてる

translation.en: My videos take hours to edit.
translation.ja: 動画の編集も立派な労働だよ

translation.en: -I do the work. -And where's it gotten you?
translation.ja: 動画の編集も立派な労働だよ 成果は？

translation.en: Nowhere.
translation.ja: ゼロだ

translation.en: I'm stuck.
translation.ja: 行き詰まった

translation.en: If I don't do something with my life that matters to me, then why do anything at all?
translation.ja: 好きなことを諦めて 興味のない道に進めと？

translation.en: Well, I just thought that you'd want to work with me,
translation.ja: 私と同じ職場なら 喜ぶかと思った

translation.en: your mom, you know, the person that raised you and loves you.
translation.ja: あなたを育て 愛してきた母親よ

translation.en: I'm wearing this new serum that blocks me from the powers of your guilt.
translation.ja: 同情を買ってもムダだよ

translation.en: Fine. Prosecution rests.
translation.ja: 分かった　私の負け

translation.en: -You mean--? -Go have fun at your fancy new job.
translation.ja: じゃあ… 新しい仕事を楽しんで

translation.en: Oh, my God. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
translation.ja: うれしい　ありがとう

translation.en: Hey, listen. Hey. Tell me one thing.
translation.ja: ねえ １つ教えて

translation.en: What does "snatched" mean?
translation.ja: “爆イケ”って？

translation.en: Dressed nice with good makeup.
translation.ja: オシャレってこと

translation.en: That's what I thought.
translation.ja: そう思った

translation.en: Hi, I'm Marco Mejia.
translation.ja: マルコ･メヒアです

translation.en: -I'm Miss Addison's new assistant. -[woman] You're late.
translation.ja: 新しいアシスタントです 遅刻よ

translation.en: -Sorry, the train took forever. -Work on that.
translation.ja: 電車が遅れて 気をつけて

translation.en: I'm Venetia Kelaher, I'm Madolyn's first assistant.
translation.ja: 第１アシスタントの ヴェネシアよ

translation.en: As far as you're concerned, I'm everything and everyone that matters to you during your time here,
translation.ja: あなたが いつまで 働くか知らないけど

translation.en: for however long, or short, that might last.
translation.ja: 勤務中は私の指示に従ってね

translation.en: So pay attention because I don't repeat myself.
translation.ja: 指示は一度だけよ よく聞いて

translation.en: Any questions? Good. Follow me.
translation.ja: いい？　ついてきて

translation.en: Glamorous by Madolyn is one of the industry's most respected beauty brands.
translation.ja: 当社は 最も信頼ある ブランドの１つよ

translation.en: And that is thanks in no small part to our director of sales,
translation.ja: 営業部長として 会社の発展に貢献してるのは

translation.en: Madolyn's son, Chad Addison.
translation.ja: マドリンの息子 チャドよ

translation.en: Oh, my God. His abs have abs.
translation.ja: 驚いた　すごい腹筋

translation.en: Yours would too if you worked out six times a day.
translation.ja: １日６回も筋トレするからね

translation.en: Is that the superstar Mom hired from the mall?
translation.ja: 例の期待の新人か？

translation.en: He has a name.
translation.ja: 名前がある

translation.en: Marco Mejia.
translation.ja: マルコよ

translation.en: Aw. Nice heels, Marco. I got ones just like them.
translation.ja: イカすハイヒールだ 僕も持ってる

translation.en: [Marco] Wait, really? Are we the same size?
translation.ja: 本当？　サイズも同じ？

translation.en: That was a joke.
translation.ja: 冗談だよ

translation.en: I was joking.
translation.ja: 本気じゃない

translation.en: I forgot to warn you. Chad's funny.
translation.ja: 言い忘れてた 彼は冗談好きなの

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, heels? Me?
translation.ja: そうさ　僕がハイヒール？

translation.en: I'm gay, but I'm not...
translation.ja: 僕はゲイだが 女装は⸺

translation.en: gay.
translation.ja: しない

translation.en: Was that another joke?
translation.ja: それも冗談？

translation.en: Okay, let's go before we have to get HR involved.
translation.ja: トラブルになる前に行くわ

translation.en: I'm sensing a little tension between you and Chad back there.
translation.ja: チャドとあなたって 仲が悪そう

translation.en: Well, some of us worked to be here and some won the lucky-sperm lottery.
translation.ja: 親の七光りで ここに入った奴もいる

translation.en: But I keep it profesh. Mostly.
translation.ja: まあ　私情は抑えるわ

translation.en: So this is Product Design.
translation.ja: ここはデザイン部門

translation.en: Every piece of artwork, branding and packaging that lands on Madolyn's desk starts here.
translation.ja: 広告やパッケージの案は 全部ここで生まれる

translation.en: Ben, Britt, this is Marco, Madolyn's new Second.
translation.ja: ベン　ブリット 新アシスタントよ

translation.en: Hi, I'm Marco.
translation.ja: マルコです

translation.en: Yeah, you are.
translation.ja: そうなの

translation.en: Um, any questions? Do you want any help?
translation.ja: 何か質問はある？

translation.en: Are you thirsty? I barely had a sip.
translation.ja: 飲む？　口はつけてない

translation.en: He gets like this when he's excited.
translation.ja: 興奮してるみたい

translation.en: I don't get like anything, especially when excited, which I am not.
translation.ja: そうじゃない 興奮なんかしてないよ

translation.en: But I could be.
translation.ja: だけど そうかも

translation.en: Why is she even talking about this?
translation.ja: なぜ こんな話を？

translation.en: Welcome to the fam, Marco.
translation.ja: ようこそ　マルコ

translation.en: Take care of him. I think he's a keeper.
translation.ja: ちゃんと面倒見なよ

translation.en: Only 'cause you asked nicely.
translation.ja: そうするわ

translation.en: -You're into him. -I am into nothing.
translation.ja: ホレた？ 勘違いだ

translation.en: -Go away. -Mm.
translation.ja: よせよ

translation.en: So it's, like, my favorite movie, but it is bad.
translation.ja: 好きだけど 名作とはいえない

translation.en: Finally, my social media intern.
translation.ja: 私のインターンね

translation.en: No. This is Marco Mejia, Madolyn's personally-handpicked Second.
translation.ja: マドリンがスカウトした アシスタントよ

translation.en: -Oh. -Marco, this is Alyssa.
translation.ja: 彼女はアリッサよ

translation.en: She produces original content across all of our social media platforms,
translation.ja: ＳＮＳ全般を担当してる

translation.en: featuring our newest products showcased by our influencer-partners.
translation.ja: インフルエンサーを使った 宣伝とかね

translation.en: Alyssa says welcome to Glamorous by Madolyn.
translation.ja: 私からひと言　“ようこそ”

translation.en: She also does that. A lot.
translation.ja: 彼女の口癖なの

translation.en: I create content too. You should follow me.
translation.ja: 僕のこともフォローして

translation.en: I would, but you only have a thousand followers.
translation.ja: フォロワーが少なすぎる

translation.en: And half of them are bots, so I can't. It would destroy my brand.
translation.ja: ブランドイメージに響くから 無理よ

translation.en: I have a feet account with more followers than that.
translation.ja: 私の足のほうが人気よ

translation.en: Her feet account is blowing up.
translation.ja: バズってるの

translation.en: But Alyssa says we should collab. I'll drag you into five figures. Find my assistant Nowhere, he'll set it up.
translation.ja: アシスタントの ノーウェアが何とかするわ

translation.en: -"Nowhere"? -I love beauty.
translation.ja: ノーウェア(どこでもない)？ 美を愛してる

translation.en: Um, is he serious?
translation.ja: 彼は正気？

translation.en: Um, yeah, he is.
translation.ja: ええ　そうよ

translation.en: Are you?
translation.ja: あなたは？

translation.en: You scared yet?
translation.ja: 不安になった？

translation.en: No way, Shantay. I'm here to slay.
translation.ja: まさか　やる気満々だよ

translation.en: You have a five-year plan, right?
translation.ja: ５年で辞める計画？

translation.en: Five years? That's two whole Gaga eras.
translation.ja: ガガのアルバム２枚分だね

translation.en: In five years, I'm gonna run my own beauty company.
translation.ja: 私は５年で独立するつもりよ

translation.en: And that takes connections.
translation.ja: だからコネが要る

translation.en: But if you make it here,
translation.ja: この会社で成功すれば

translation.en: you can open any door in the business.
translation.ja: どんな扉でも開ける

translation.en: Whatever you do, don't touch anything.
translation.ja: 何も触らないでね

translation.en: Oh. Hello. [chuckles]
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: It all feels like yesterday.
translation.ja: いい思い出よ

translation.en: Do you ever miss it?
translation.ja: 昔が恋しい？

translation.en: -Mm. The '80s? God, no. -Mm.
translation.ja: 80年代はこりごり

translation.en: Too much mousse and not enough tweezing.
translation.ja: ムースまみれで眉はボサボサ

translation.en: I mean, modeling. The fashion, the parties, the men...
translation.ja: モデルの仕事とパーティー 男性との出会い…

translation.en: The drugs, which I was far too young to experience.
translation.ja: ドラッグもね 私には早すぎた

translation.en: No, that party's over.
translation.ja: 宴(うたげ)は終わったわ

translation.en: I run a business now and that might not sound as exciting,
translation.ja: 会社の経営は 地味に見えるでしょうけど やりがいがある

translation.en: but it's definitely rewarding.
translation.ja: 地味に見えるでしょうけど やりがいがある

translation.en: That's great.
translation.ja: いいですね

translation.en: You sound very... comfortable.
translation.ja: 現状に満足してる

translation.en: Comfortable?
translation.ja: 満足？

translation.en: I like confidence in my employees, Marco.
translation.ja: 自信のある部下は大歓迎よ

translation.en: As long as they have the skills to back it up.
translation.ja: 実力が伴っていればね

translation.en: Venetia?
translation.ja: ヴェネシア？

translation.en: Hey, gorgeenas. It's me, Marco.
translation.ja: みんな　マルコだよ

translation.en: It has been a whole week since I started my gig at Glamorous by Madolyn.
translation.ja: グラマラスに入って １週間が経った

translation.en: And I am back-back-back-back-back again to give you the slay-by-slay.
translation.ja: 僕の有能っぷりを みんなに報告してあげる

translation.en: So, what's it take to make it in makeup?
translation.ja: 成功に必要なのは？

translation.en: Focus. You gotta step it up and do the heavy lifting.
translation.ja: 集中力 それに腕力も必要だ

translation.en: And believe me, I am.
translation.ja: 僕は完璧だよ

translation.en: Yikes. It went everywhere.
translation.ja: こぼしちゃった

translation.en: There is nothing they could throw at me that I could not catch.
translation.ja: どんな仕事も こなせる

translation.en: In the real world, I stick out.
translation.ja: 社会では はみ出し者だけど

translation.en: -But here, I stand out. -Hi. Hold. Hold. Hold.
translation.ja: 会社では抜きんでた存在

translation.en: I'm thriving.
translation.ja: 絶好調だよ

translation.en: This job is like a breath of fresh air.
translation.ja: 新鮮な風を浴びて働いてる

translation.en: -How's the new kid doing? -[scoffs]
translation.ja: 新人の様子は？

translation.en: He is flopping like a Katy Perry single.
translation.ja: 全然ダメだわ

translation.en: Good. I was worried.
translation.ja: なら心配ないね

translation.en: Worried? Why?
translation.ja: 何の心配？

translation.en: You remember how you got your job?
translation.ja: 前例を忘れた？

translation.en: Madolyn hired me to be her Second.
translation.ja: 私が入社した直後⸺

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -Right before she fired her First.
translation.ja: 先任アシスタントは解雇

translation.en: But he's a flop, so you're fine. Right?
translation.ja: 新人がドジなら あんたは安泰

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: [Marco] That's it for now for me, gorgeenas,
translation.ja: 今日は ここまで

translation.en: but I'll be back tomorrow living the dream every day with you.
translation.ja: また明日 一緒に夢をかなえようね

translation.en: 'Cause we're only getting started.
translation.ja: 新生活は まだまだこれから

translation.en: But before I go, remember this.
translation.ja: 最後に これは忘れないで

translation.en: You're beautiful. Say it back.
translation.ja: あなたは きれいだよ 僕にも言って

translation.en: You realize this is exactly what we sent Sephora last year?
translation.ja: 去年 セフォラに 同じ資料を送ったわ

translation.en: Correction. It's what we sent everyone last year.
translation.ja: どの店にも同じものを送った

translation.en: Maybe this is why retail is down year after year.
translation.ja: だから売り上げが 落ちる一方なのかも

translation.en: Sure. Okay.
translation.ja: それなら⸺

translation.en: We could take some risks,
translation.ja: リスクを取ってみようか

translation.en: shake things up.
translation.ja: テコ入れだ

translation.en: Or...
translation.ja: あるいは…

translation.en: [woman on TV] What makes you beautiful?
translation.ja: あなたの美の源は？

translation.en: We do. Vendemiaire.
translation.ja: ヴァンデミエールです

translation.en: Forty-two brands, six continents, one you.
translation.ja: 世界中の42ブランドを あなたの元へ

translation.en: Vendemiaire. You're more than beauty, more than ever.
translation.ja: 美を超越した 最高の自分になりましょう

translation.en: We could sell to the biggest beauty empire in the world and get ugly rich.
translation.ja: 世界最大のグループに 会社を売り 大富豪になる

translation.en: You finally heard back? I thought they weren't interested.
translation.ja: 先方の返事は？

translation.en: Well, they are. Very.
translation.ja: かなり興味を持ってる

translation.en: And the best part is, they want to keep you and your creative voice.
translation.ja: 母さんには 会社に残ってほしいそうだ

translation.en: You get to stay in control. You get to stay in charge.
translation.ja: 今までどおり 主導権を握りつつ

translation.en: And we get the money we need to grow, to expand...
translation.ja: 資金を手に入れて 事業規模を拡大し…

translation.en: To innovate?
translation.ja: 革新を起こす？

translation.en: Let's leave the lip glitter to TikTok. We're a heritage brand.
translation.ja: 流行(はや)りものに 手を出す必要はない

translation.en: You mean, we're bland.
translation.ja: それじゃ味気ない

translation.en: We're successful, unlike the 90% of new brands that fail in our space every year.
translation.ja: うちはシビアな業界で 生き残って成功した

translation.en: We're about to get a lifeline to preserve your legacy. Let's not throw that away.
translation.ja: 伝統を維持してくれる 買い手がいるのに断るの？

translation.en: Meeting's in five.
translation.ja: 会議です

translation.en: Venetia, is Marco back?
translation.ja: マルコは戻った？

translation.en: He's just picked up the new samples. He's practically in the elevator.
translation.ja: サンプルを持って すぐに戻ります

translation.en: Probably got busy creating content for his channel.
translation.ja: 自分の動画作りで 忙しいのかも

translation.en: Ever notice how he's always on his phone?
translation.ja: 携帯ばかり見てる

translation.en: I like him. He's got a point of view, he's interesting.
translation.ja: マルコの視点は独特なの

translation.en: We need that here. He has our customers' perspective.
translation.ja: 彼のような 顧客目線の意見は⸺

translation.en: We're missing that.
translation.ja: うちに必要よ

translation.en: What's that matter if you can't do the work?
translation.ja: 仕事ができなくても？

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.ja: どう思う？

translation.en: Give him some time. He'll be fine.
translation.ja: 少し時間をください

translation.en: I'll show him the ropes. Not like I'm going anywhere, right?
translation.ja: 私がちゃんと仕事を教えます

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: -Come on, come on. -[cell phone beeps]
translation.ja: 早くして

translation.en: Yes. Yes, yes, yes.
translation.ja: やっと来た

translation.en: Hi.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: I'm Marco. I need you to drive stupid fast. I'm already late.
translation.ja: マルコだよ 遅刻してるから急いで

translation.en: Hi, Marco. I'm Parker.
translation.ja: やあ　俺はパーカーだ

translation.en: You're, uh... You're in my Uber.
translation.ja: 俺が呼んだタクシーだよ

translation.en: Check again, straight boy. Mine's a black Prius.
translation.ja: 僕は黒のプリウスを呼んだ

translation.en: Uh, mine is too, and you're in it. See?
translation.ja: 俺もだ　間違えたのは君さ

translation.en: Of course I got in the wrong Uber.
translation.ja: やっちゃった

translation.en: I messed up everything else this week, why not this?
translation.ja: 今週は失敗続き

translation.en: Hey. Hey, hey, chew your food.
translation.ja: なあ　落ち着けよ

translation.en: It's gonna be fine.
translation.ja: 大丈夫さ

translation.en: Hope I remembered to wear waterproof 'cause I'm gonna cry.
translation.ja: 涙でマスカラが落ちちゃう

translation.en: No. You're not.
translation.ja: いや　そうはならない

translation.en: Where you going?
translation.ja: 行き先は？

translation.en: Hudson Yards.
translation.ja: ハドソンヤード

translation.en: Me too. Lucky us.
translation.ja: 俺もだ　よかったな

translation.en: Your day's getting better by the minute.
translation.ja: 運が向いてきた

translation.en: Trust me, it's just gonna get worse.
translation.ja: まさか　不運になる一方だよ

translation.en: Tough job?
translation.ja: つらい仕事？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: まあね

translation.en: I'm flopping harder than a Terminator sequel.
translation.ja: コケた続編映画より 大失敗してる

translation.en: I don't even know why. It's makeup. I am makeup.
translation.ja: メイクは 僕のすべてなのに⸺

translation.en: I can't do it.
translation.ja: ヘマばかり

translation.en: It's hard. It's a real job.
translation.ja: まともな仕事って大変

translation.en: What am I gonna do?
translation.ja: どうしよう

translation.en: You're gonna not give up.
translation.ja: 諦めるなよ

translation.en: You can do hard things, right?
translation.ja: 君なら頑張れる

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: うん

translation.en: Hey, don't be too hard on yourself.
translation.ja: あまり思い詰めるな

translation.en: We all make mistakes.
translation.ja: 誰でもミスする

translation.en: Aw, crap.
translation.ja: マジかよ

translation.en: Hey. I know I'm supposed to be here, but do I have to be here?
translation.ja: ねえ 私も参加しなきゃダメ？

translation.en: 'Cause I'm already bored.
translation.ja: 退屈すぎるわ

translation.en: Sorry, I'm late. There was traffic.
translation.ja: すみません　渋滞してて

translation.en: [Britt] Did you ask him out yet?
translation.ja: デートには？

translation.en: [scoffs] Yeah, yeah. We're going out this Neverday at Never o'clock.
translation.ja: マルコと出かけるなんて 絶対に あり得ない

translation.en: Ask him. If he says no, I'll hit him.
translation.ja: 誘いなよ 断ったら殴るわ

translation.en: -That's assault. Now I'm an accessory. -Okay.
translation.ja: 暴行だ　僕も共犯になる

translation.en: I'm not asking anyone out who works here, okay?
translation.ja: 同僚は誘わない主義だ

translation.en: [Madolyn] Chad, you're up.
translation.ja: 始めて

translation.en: When I first came here from Stanford, I didn't know what a gondola was.
translation.ja: スタンフォード卒の僕は ゴンドラを知らなかった

translation.en: "Gondolas? Those are those little boats in Italy, right?"
translation.ja: “ゴンドラって イタリアの小舟のこと？”

translation.en: Wrong, Chad!
translation.ja: “チャド　不正解！”

translation.en: I mean, yes, they are those boats in Italy and in other places.
translation.ja: ゴンドラには 小舟という意味もある

translation.en: But to us, they are so much more.
translation.ja: だが それだけじゃない

translation.en: To us, they are these big shiny things
translation.ja: 売り場で 化粧品を並べるための⸺

translation.en: that display our products in retail locations,
translation.ja: 大きくて キラキラした台座

translation.en: filled with mirrors and lights,
translation.ja: 鏡とライトを備えていて

translation.en: and the fingerprints of ladies touching them.
translation.ja: 女性たちの指紋まみれ

translation.en: And to the consumer, a gondola can be more motivating to a purchase
translation.ja: 消費者には どんな広告よりも

translation.en: than all of our marketing combined.
translation.ja: 購買意欲をかき立てる存在だ

translation.en: And that is a fact you can't make up.
translation.ja: それが ごまかし(メイク･アップ)が 利かない真実

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.ja: 勘弁して

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, after six months of research and redesign,
translation.ja: ６ヵ月かけて 調査と再設計を行い

translation.en: I am so proud to present to you
translation.ja: 自信作が完成した

translation.en: the all-new gondola from Glamorous by Madolyn.
translation.ja: 我が社の新ゴンドラだ

translation.en: New? It's the same.
translation.ja: 前と同じよ

translation.en: Uh... Well, no, Mom, look, the knobs are round now, so...
translation.ja: 母さん　見て ノブが丸くなった

translation.en: That took six months of research?
translation.ja: 半年かかって これ？

translation.en: The research showed us that people already liked the gondolas.
translation.ja: 客は今のゴンドラが好きだ

translation.en: Why redesign what really works?
translation.ja: 人気があるものを なぜ変える？

translation.en: -Why redesign to begin with? -Exactly.
translation.ja: 理由を知りたい？ ああ

translation.en: I need to see the new prototypes in the gondola.
translation.ja: 新作のサンプルを そのゴンドラに置いて

translation.en: -Oh, Marco has them. -Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: マルコ はい

translation.en: I think I left them in my Uber.
translation.ja: タクシーに忘れた

translation.en: This hasn't been your week, has it?
translation.ja: 苦労してるみたいね

translation.en: I'm sorry. This will not happen again.
translation.ja: もう二度と忘れません

translation.en: Oh, you're right. It won't.
translation.ja: ああ　今回で終わりだ

translation.en: Am I fired?
translation.ja: クビですか？

translation.en: You lost product prototypes. Trade secrets.
translation.ja: 企業秘密のサンプルを なくしたんだぞ

translation.en: -Of course, you are fired! -[microphone feedback]
translation.ja: クビに決まってるだろ

translation.en: I'm sorry this didn't work out.
translation.ja: こうなって残念だわ

translation.en: -Really? -Yes.
translation.ja: 本当に？ ああ

translation.en: I know my time here was short,
translation.ja: 短い間でしたが⸺

translation.en: but I won't forget a thing.
translation.ja: 一生の思い出ができました

translation.en: And I have a feeling you won't either.
translation.ja: 皆さんも僕を忘れないはず

translation.en: -Let's get back to work. Shall we? -Thank you.
translation.ja: 続けましょう 分かった

translation.en: Okay, so Uber can't tell us which car Marco left the samples in
translation.ja: サンプルは行方知れずだ

translation.en: because it wasn't his,
translation.ja: タクシーだし

translation.en: and they won't give us a rundown of all rides ending at Hudson Yards
translation.ja: ここに来た車を すべて調べることはできない

translation.en: because of privacy, so basically we have a problem.
translation.ja: ここに来た車を すべて調べることはできない 困ったぞ

translation.en: If Vendemiaire finds out we can't protect our own IP, the whole sale is effed.
translation.ja: ヴァンデミエールにバレたら 売却の話は消える

translation.en: Not if we start over.
translation.ja: やり直せばいい

translation.en: Start over? What do you mean?
translation.ja: 母さん　どういう意味？

translation.en: You wanna throw out the product prototypes?
translation.ja: サンプルは諦めるの？

translation.en: We're trying to sell the company. It's a bad time to be playing around.
translation.ja: 売却前だ おとなしくしてよう

translation.en: -Then we don't sell. I won't play it safe. -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.ja: 私は無難な道は選ばない

translation.en: You think I play it safe?
translation.ja: 僕が無難だと？

translation.en: I didn't say that.
translation.ja: そうは言ってない

translation.en: But it feels like you did. What does that mean?
translation.ja: 遠回しに言った

translation.en: -You think I don't have ideas? -Oh, Chad.
translation.ja: 僕に発想力がないと？

translation.en: It's about that kid you hired at the mall, isn't it?
translation.ja: 例の新人のせいだな？

translation.en: Some twink in heels swoops in and suddenly your own son can't even get through to you.
translation.ja: 息子より あの若造が大切なのか？

translation.en: It's just...
translation.ja: 私は ただ…

translation.en: Marco understood what our customers want.
translation.ja: マルコは顧客の望みを 理解していた

translation.en: And I don't?
translation.ja: 僕は違うと？

translation.en: You know what? Don't worry about it.
translation.ja: 分かった　心配しないで

translation.en: I'll get on the horn and do all the work to fix this before it's too late.
translation.ja: 手遅れになる前に 僕が何とかする

translation.en: And I hope it is good enough for you.
translation.ja: それで満足だろ

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.ja: 今なら いけそうね

translation.en: Okay. Um...
translation.ja: “マドリン･ アディソン” “マドリン･ アディソン” えっと…

translation.en: [Britt] Venetia?
translation.ja: ヴェネシア？

translation.en: Venetia, what are you doing down there?
translation.ja: 机の下で何してるの？

translation.en: I don't know. What are you doing up there?
translation.ja: さあね　そっちこそ何を？

translation.en: Dropping off the new selects.
translation.ja: 資料を届けに来た

translation.en: You're on Madolyn's computer.
translation.ja: パソコンを見てた？

translation.en: No, I'm not.
translation.ja: 違う

translation.en: Is this another made-up crisis that you overthink and overreact to?
translation.ja: また考えすぎて 過剰反応してる？

translation.en: Hmm? Whatever it is, it's not too late to fix.
translation.ja: 今なら引き返せるよ

translation.en: This is not a made-up crisis.
translation.ja: 過剰反応じゃない

translation.en: This one is a real crisis because you were right.
translation.ja: あなたが言ったとおりよ

translation.en: Madolyn hired Marco to replace me. I need to get into her laptop to prove it.
translation.ja: マルコは私の代わりなのか 確かめる

translation.en: I just need something I can lift her fingerprint off of...
translation.ja: マドリンの指紋があれば…

translation.en: She fired Marco. You're fine.
translation.ja: 彼はクビ　あんたは無事よ

translation.en: Do you think she'd ever promote someone she wanted to fire?
translation.ja: 昇進させないのは クビの予兆？

translation.en: I've been here three years without a promotion.
translation.ja: 私は３年間 昇進してない

translation.en: I thought maybe it's because we're a small company. Only so many seats at the table, gotta wait your turn, right?
translation.ja: ポストがないだけだと 思ったけど

translation.en: But what if that's not it? What if she's just... over it?
translation.ja: もしかして マドリンは私を⸺ 見限った？

translation.en: -I know one way you'll get fired. -Hmm?
translation.ja: パソコンを見たら⸺

translation.en: Getting caught hacking her MacBook.
translation.ja: クビは確実だよ

translation.en: Now go home,
translation.ja: 家に帰って⸺

translation.en: -light this... -Mm.
translation.ja: これを吸いな

translation.en: ...watch some Shonda, and don't do anything crazy.
translation.ja: バカなマネは よしなよ

translation.en: -All right. Okay. -All right.
translation.ja: そうね そうよ 分かった

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: 心配ないって

translation.en: -Thanks for the Turtle Tracks. -I had a feeling you were gonna need it.
translation.ja: アイス うれしい 必要だと思った

translation.en: I couldn't swing it.
translation.ja: ダメだった

translation.en: -You were right. -Of course. I'm always right.
translation.ja: ママの勝ち 私は常に正しいの

translation.en: I thought I had it all figured out.
translation.ja: やっと道が開けて⸺

translation.en: I was finally gonna do something exciting, and I found what I was supposed to do.
translation.ja: やるべきことを 見つけたと思ったのに

translation.en: I didn't want my job at first. I wanted more. I had plans.
translation.ja: 私も最初は 夢を抱いてたけど

translation.en: And then Voldemort showed up, and a little while later, you did.
translation.ja: 闇の魔法使いと出会い あなたが生まれた

translation.en: You shouldn't call Dad that anymore. J.K.'s, like, extremely canceled.
translation.ja: パパを そんなふうに呼ばないで

translation.en: Before he came along, I was gonna go to an Ivy League law school or at least a good one.
translation.ja: 昔の私は 有名大学の ロースクールを目指してた

translation.en: I was gonna be a white-shoe lawyer, and work in the city, and drink cocktails,
translation.ja: エリート弁護士になって ニューヨークで働くの

translation.en: and balance my personal life and professional life.
translation.ja: エリート弁護士になって ニューヨークで働くの 仕事と家庭を両立してね

translation.en: But instead I'm a single mom who files trademarks for a living.
translation.ja: 現実は しがないシングルマザーよ

translation.en: You are the only thing I've done that matters.
translation.ja: 人生で誇れるものは あなただけ

translation.en: That's why I'm hard. That's why I care.
translation.ja: だから厳しいことも言う

translation.en: You are my more.
translation.ja: あなたが夢よ

translation.en: And if you waste your life, then I've wasted mine.
translation.ja: 私の人生の価値は あなた次第なの

translation.en: I can't believe I'm gonna say this. You have to go back.
translation.ja: 明日 会社に行って

translation.en: You're going back to Glamorous tomorrow. You're gonna get your job back.
translation.ja: 明日 会社に行って 仕事を取り戻しなさい

translation.en: -I am? -Yes, you are.
translation.ja: 本気？ そうよ

translation.en: Because taking a risk is scary, but watching you give up is terrifying.
translation.ja: あなたが夢を諦めるだなんて ゾッとする

translation.en: Okay, I can't just march in there and demand my job back.
translation.ja: また雇えなんて言えないよ

translation.en: -I messed up. I lost their samples. -Then find them.
translation.ja: サンプルをなくしたのに 捜して

translation.en: -Girl, how? -You're always on your phone.
translation.ja: 方法は？ 携帯が役に立つでしょ？

translation.en: It's good for something, right?
translation.ja: 携帯が役に立つでしょ？

translation.en: Hmm. I left them in an Uber with somebody dressed for the gym.
translation.ja: 同乗者は ジムに行く服装だった

translation.en: Do people Uber to the gym?
translation.ja: タクシーでジム？

translation.en: -Was he white? -Okay, yep, that explains it.
translation.ja: 白人？ ああ　なるほど

translation.en: There's an Equinox at Hudson Yards. That's where he was headed. I bet you I can find him there.
translation.ja: ハドソンヤードの 高級ジムで彼を捜す

translation.en: How? You don't have a membership. That place is expensive.
translation.ja: 高い会費が必要でしょ？

translation.en: You're right. I'm not a member.
translation.ja: 僕は会員じゃないけど⸺

translation.en: I'm a scammer.
translation.ja: ウソは得意

translation.en: -Too bad about Marco, huh? -Yeah.
translation.ja: マルコは残念ね

translation.en: At least you can ask him out now. Since he doesn't work here anymore.
translation.ja: でも同僚じゃないから デートに誘える

translation.en: -[Ben] I don't have his number. -I do.
translation.ja: 連絡先が… 知ってる

translation.en: Well, I don't want to, okay?
translation.ja: 誘いたくない

translation.en: It'd be creepy and weird, and he'd probably say no.
translation.ja: 不審に思って 断られるさ

translation.en: I mean, look at him.
translation.ja: 彼と僕は⸺

translation.en: Look at me.
translation.ja: 違いすぎる

translation.en: But if I did ask him out-- And I won't.
translation.ja: 仮に 誘うとしたら⸺

translation.en: --what do I say?
translation.ja: 何て言えば？

translation.en: Anything.
translation.ja: 何でもいい

translation.en: Just say it loud.
translation.ja: 大きな声で言うの

translation.en: Sometimes in life, if you want something, you gotta do whatever it takes to get it.
translation.ja: 欲しいものは 全力でつかむのよ

translation.en: So crazy question, but if I wanted to cancel this tomorrow,
translation.ja: 明日 入会をキャンセルしたら

translation.en: I wouldn't get charged, right?
translation.ja: 会費は不要？

translation.en: Just, like, in theory?
translation.ja: 仮の話だけど

translation.en: [instructor] Now left. Right.
translation.ja: 左　次は右

translation.en: Once strong.
translation.ja: もっと強く

translation.en: Parker?
translation.ja: パーカー？

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: It's me, Marco. I--
translation.ja: マルコだよ

translation.en: I left something in your Uber the other day.
translation.ja: この間 忘れ物をした

translation.en: Yeah, you did.
translation.ja: そうだったな

translation.en: I have it right here.
translation.ja: ここにある

translation.en: -You do? -Yeah. Uh...
translation.ja: 本当に？ ああ

translation.en: Oh. Technically, it's mine now...
translation.ja: 今は俺の所有物だけど⸺

translation.en: but I guess I can do you a solid.
translation.ja: 君に返す

translation.en: You have no idea how much you saved my life.
translation.ja: 君は人生の救世主だ

translation.en: -What's in there? -None of your business, straight boy.
translation.ja: 中身は？ ストレート君には関係ない

translation.en: But, also, thank you. Seriously. [chuckles]
translation.ja: でも感謝してる

translation.en: -I gotta go. -Can I give you some advice
translation.ja: それじゃ… 君が消える前にアドバイスだ

translation.en: before you run away?
translation.ja: 君が消える前にアドバイスだ

translation.en: Pay a little more attention to, uh...
translation.ja: 誰かを ストレート君と呼ぶ前に

translation.en: who you're calling straight boy. Yeah?
translation.ja: 相手を よく見ろ

translation.en: See you around.
translation.ja: またな

translation.en: Love this for me.
translation.ja: いい感じ

translation.en: -Marco. -Hey, you can't just walk in here.
translation.ja: マルコ 戻ってくるなよ

translation.en: I'm a twink on PrEP, I can do anything.
translation.ja: 僕は怖いものなし 何でもできる

translation.en: Oh. Our samples.
translation.ja: うちのサンプルね

translation.en: -How? -I used my phone.
translation.ja: そんな 携帯を使った

translation.en: I may not be good at everything, but I am good at that.
translation.ja: 数少ない得意分野だからね

translation.en: Great. But if you think that means you get your job back--
translation.ja: たとえ サンプルが戻っても…

translation.en: Let him say what he came here to say.
translation.ja: マルコの話を聞きましょう

translation.en: I'm not perfect. I have a lot to learn.
translation.ja: 僕は完璧じゃないし 未熟です

translation.en: I am bad at math, the oldest movie I've seen is Titanic,
translation.ja: 数字が苦手で 昔の映画に疎い

translation.en: and I don't know who Cher is.
translation.ja: シェールも知らない

translation.en: I may be young and flaky and unrealistic, but I can fix that.
translation.ja: 頼りなくて無知なところは 直します

translation.en: I can put down my phone down once in a while, and I can learn.
translation.ja: 携帯から離れて勉強するし

translation.en: I can grow.
translation.ja: 僕は成長する

translation.en: The question is, can you?
translation.ja: でも あなた方は？

translation.en: 'Cause this gondola is a joke.
translation.ja: ふざけたゴンドラです

translation.en: I mean, of course, it's the same. Everything here is the same.
translation.ja: この会社は何も変わらない

translation.en: Nothing here has changed.
translation.ja: ずっと同じままです

translation.en: Except for you.
translation.ja: あなたは違う

translation.en: What happened to that queen who built this company because everyone told her she couldn't?
translation.ja: 不可能に挑み 自分が正しいと証明した⸺

translation.en: Who got off on proving people wrong?
translation.ja: 昔のあなたは どこへ？

translation.en: You've been so focused on what people want, you completely forgot what people need.
translation.ja: なぜ 人々のニーズを 忘れたんですか？

translation.en: Inspiration. Love. Light.
translation.ja: インスピレーション　愛 そして希望

translation.en: You have the most important job in the world.
translation.ja: 世界一 大切な仕事なんです

translation.en: You give people like me a reason to get up in the morning.
translation.ja: 僕のような人間に 毎朝 希望を与え⸺

translation.en: And you give us the chance to be anything we wanna be.
translation.ja: なりたい姿になる チャンスをくれる

translation.en: But if you really have given up,
translation.ja: あなたが諦めたなら

translation.en: then I'm gonna walk out that door. And I'm gonna stay gone.
translation.ja: 僕は ここを出て もう戻りません

translation.en: Well...
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: thank you, Marco.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: -Venetia, throw those samples away. -What?
translation.ja: サンプルは廃棄よ なぜ？

translation.en: And that gondola too. We can do better.
translation.ja: そこのゴンドラもね

translation.en: No, Mom. The gondola is--
translation.ja: 母さん　ゴンドラは…

translation.en: We have the best customers in this business.
translation.ja: 私たちには最高の顧客がいる

translation.en: And I want us to feel the same way they do when they use our products.
translation.ja: 彼らと同じ気持ちに なりたいの

translation.en: Like anything is possible.
translation.ja: 不可能はないとね

translation.en: I hope you brought a change of clothes.
translation.ja: 着替えはある？

translation.en: I don't think those shorts are work-appropriate.
translation.ja: その服は 職場には ふさわしくない

translation.en: Does she mean...?
translation.ja: それって…

translation.en: She's giving you a second chance.
translation.ja: ２度目のチャンスよ

translation.en: Use it.
translation.ja: 活用して

translation.en: Move, I'm gay!
translation.ja: どいて　ゲイが通る

translation.en: I'm Ben.
translation.ja: ベンだ

translation.en: Yeah, you work with that girl in Product Design.
translation.ja: デザイン部門の人だよね

translation.en: I do? Oh, yeah. I mean, of course, I--
translation.ja: 僕？　もちろんそうさ

translation.en: I'm Ben.
translation.ja: 名前はベン

translation.en: Wanna get a drink sometime?
translation.ja: 飲みに行く？

translation.en: -You mean, like a date? -[elevator bell dings]
translation.ja: デートってこと？

translation.en: No. That's outrageous. We work together.
translation.ja: 不適切だ　僕らは同僚だし

translation.en: No, I just mean to hang out.
translation.ja: ただ軽く遊ぶだけ

translation.en: You seem cool.
translation.ja: すてきだし

translation.en: I do?
translation.ja: 僕が？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: うん

translation.en: Oh, okay. Yeah. Uh, just, you know, hit me up or something.
translation.ja: それじゃ いつでも誘ってくれ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: -Someone's in a good mood. -Me?
translation.ja: ご機嫌だね 僕が？

translation.en: No, no. I'm in a normal mood.
translation.ja: 違う　普段どおりさ

translation.en: -You did it. You asked him out. -I asked no one out. That's crazy.
translation.ja: 彼を誘った？ バカ言うな

translation.en: -You're crazy. Yeah. -No, I'm not.
translation.ja: おかしい いいえ

translation.en: Get to work.
translation.ja: 仕事しろよ

translation.en: Vogue Italia, Dazed, i-D, an iced coffee for you,
translation.ja: 雑誌とアイスコーヒーだよ

translation.en: and a triple latte, extra foam, double cup for our queen.
translation.ja: 我らが女王にはラテを

translation.en: -Nice hustle. -Mm.
translation.ja: 張り切ってるね

translation.en: And in stilettos no less.
translation.ja: ハイヒールも

translation.en: Girl, if I need kitten heels to do my job, I am not doing my job.
translation.ja: ローヒールじゃ やる気が出ない

translation.en: I have to use the restroom, so why don't you handle the phones and bring Madolyn her coffee?
translation.ja: トイレに行くから 電話番をお願い

translation.en: I am not gonna let you flop.
translation.ja: 私がフォローするわ

translation.en: Hi, Madolyn. Can I just say, I--?
translation.ja: あの　言いたいことが…

translation.en: Marco, this job isn't just glitter and glamour. It's hard work too.
translation.ja: この仕事は厳しいの 華やかなだけじゃない

translation.en: Makeup can help you decide who you want to be today,
translation.ja: メイクは 変身の手助けになる

translation.en: but who you become...
translation.ja: どう変わるかは⸺

translation.en: that's up to you.
translation.ja: 自分次第よ

translation.en: That is iconic.
translation.ja: 名言です

translation.en: I have to go write that down.
translation.ja: 書き留めたい

translation.en: -[phone ringing] -Answer that first.
translation.ja: 電話に出て

translation.en: [Marco] Yeah.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: Venetia.
translation.ja: ヴェネシア

translation.en: -How are you liking the new kid? -Marco?
translation.ja: 新人をどう思う？ マルコ？　面白くて賢いわ

translation.en: Um, he's fun. He's smart.
translation.ja: マルコ？　面白くて賢いわ

translation.en: He's probably gonna have my job in a week. Glad you asked, Chad.
translation.ja: 私は お払い箱かも

translation.en: -You don't like him, do you? -No, I like him.
translation.ja: 奴が嫌い？ いいえ　好きよ

translation.en: I just hate the fact he'll steal my job because your mom is,
translation.ja: ただ マドリンに飽きられて

translation.en: what, bored with me, I guess?
translation.ja: クビになるのがつらい

translation.en: I don't get it. He's been here a week, and he's causing her to rethink everything.
translation.ja: 奴が来て１週間で 母さんは考えを変えた

translation.en: He's gonna eff up the Vendemiaire deal, I just know it.
translation.ja: 売却の話も消えるだろう

translation.en: Well, I guess we're both screwed.
translation.ja: お互いピンチね

translation.en: Not if we do something about it.
translation.ja: 手を打てばいい

translation.en: Like what?
translation.ja: 例えば？

translation.en: We ruin that twink.
translation.ja: 奴を とっちめて⸺

translation.en: Take him out, kick him back to the makeup counter from which he came.
translation.ja: 元の売り場に戻してやるのさ

translation.en: You want me to get Marco fired to save my job?
translation.ja: 彼をクビにさせろって？

translation.en: Sorry, Chad, I just don't swim on that side of the pool.
translation.ja: そんなことは できない

translation.en: This might sound harsh,
translation.ja: 厳しいことを言うが

translation.en: but this business is not all glitter and glamour.
translation.ja: この仕事は 華やかなだけじゃない

translation.en: We are warriors who make contour cream.
translation.ja: 僕たちは化粧下地を作り

translation.en: We are soldiers who sell lipliner.
translation.ja: リップライナーを売る戦士だ

translation.en: You wanna win? Then you are going to have to fight.
translation.ja: 勝利が欲しけりゃ 戦って手に入れろ

translation.en: [Marco] What's it take to make it in makeup?
translation.ja: 成功に必要なのは？

translation.en: Focus.
translation.ja: 集中力

translation.en: [Venetia] If you make it here, you can open any door in the business.
translation.ja: 今シーズンの あらすじは… 今シーズンの あらすじは… ここで成功すれば どんな扉も開ける ここで成功すれば どんな扉も開ける

translation.en: Pick your fights, especially when they're against the boss's son.
translation.ja: 敵は慎重に選んで 相手は社長の息子よ

translation.en: You really are so fun to have around.
translation.ja: 君は本当に面白いね

translation.en: I have to get this right. People are counting on me.
translation.ja: 期待に応えなきゃ

translation.en: -You need to trust yourself. -How close are you guys?
translation.ja: 自分を信じて 親密なのか？

translation.en: Does she talk about me?
translation.ja: 彼女は僕の話を？

translation.en: He's funny. He's cute. He worships me.
translation.ja: 私にベタボレなの

translation.en: That would be unprofessional.
translation.ja: プロらしくない

translation.en: Wait, I know you. You're Marco's boy.
translation.ja: マルコの彼氏だろ？

translation.en: Did he call me that?
translation.ja: そう呼んでた？

translation.en: [Britt] He has another guy.
translation.ja: 他にも男がいる

translation.en: If you want something, you gotta do whatever it takes to get it.
translation.ja: 欲しいものは 全力でつかむのよ

translation.en: One scoop of this and things get real serious.
translation.ja: 引き返せなくなるよ

translation.en: There is nothing they could throw at me that I could not catch.
translation.ja: どんな仕事も こなせる

translation.en: Hello, Marco.
translation.ja: やあ　マルコ

translation.en: [Madolyn] I'm going to need all of your creative talent
translation.ja: みんなの才能を生かして

translation.en: to say something that matters.
translation.ja: 価値ある意見を伝えたい

translation.en: And I ain't too proud to say I came up with that tagline.
translation.ja: 自慢じゃないけど 私が考えたキャッチコピーよ

translation.en: -It's from a really old song I heard. -It's not that old.
translation.ja: 古い歌を引用した 古くない

translation.en: -It's a really old song. -It's not.
translation.ja: 古いです いいえ
